Package Model

Class SeatLayout

java.lang.Object
Model.SeatLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SeatLayout extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a seat layout in the cinema. Each cinema will have a seat layout
Since:
2022-10-11
See Also:

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SeatLayout()
    Creates a new set of seats of 10 rows and 10 columns Seats are initialised to be available

      col - The column the seat is located at
